name: Featured collection #18
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color

  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign bottom_content_mt = section.settings.bottom_content_mt
  assign bottom_content_mt_mobile = section.settings.bottom_content_mt_mobile

  assign collection = section.settings.collection
  assign collection_show = section.settings.collection_show

  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view

  assign media_type = section.settings.media_type
  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign video = section.settings.video
  assign video_url = section.settings.video_url

  assign media_ratio = section.settings.media_ratio
  assign media_ratio_mobile = section.settings.media_ratio_mobile
  assign media_border_thickness = section.settings.media_border_thickness
  assign media_border_color = section.settings.media_border_color
  assign media_radius = section.settings.media_radius
  assign media_overlay = section.settings.media_overlay
  assign media_overlay_color = section.settings.media_overlay_color

  assign controls_size = section.settings.controls_size
  assign controls_size_mobile = section.settings.controls_size_mobile
  assign controls_radius = section.settings.controls_radius
  assign controls_border_thickness = section.settings.controls_border_thickness
  
  assign media_mute_color = section.settings.media_mute_color
  assign media_mute_hover_color = section.settings.media_mute_hover_color
  assign media_mute_bg_color = section.settings.media_mute_bg_color
  assign media_mute_hover_bg_color = section.settings.media_mute_hover_bg_color
  assign media_mute_border_color = section.settings.media_mute_border_color
  assign media_mute_border_hover_color = section.settings.media_mute_border_hover_color

  assign use_action = section.settings.use_action
  assign action_color = section.settings.action_color
  assign action_hover_color = section.settings.action_hover_color
  assign action_bg_color = section.settings.action_bg_color
  assign action_bg_hover_color = section.settings.action_bg_hover_color
  assign action_border_color = section.settings.action_border_color
  assign action_border_hover_color = section.settings.action_border_hover_color

  assign media_badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.media_badge_padding_horizontal
  assign media_badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.media_badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign media_badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.media_badge_padding_vertical
  assign media_badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.media_badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign media_badge = section.settings.media_badge
  assign media_badge_custom = section.settings.media_badge_custom
  assign media_badge_font = section.settings.media_badge_font
  assign media_badge_size = section.settings.media_badge_size
  assign media_badge_size_mobile = section.settings.media_badge_size_mobile
  assign media_badge_height = section.settings.media_badge_height
  assign media_badge_color = section.settings.media_badge_color
  assign media_badge_bg_color = section.settings.media_badge_bg_color
  assign media_badge_radius = section.settings.media_badge_radius

  assign media_content_align = section.settings.media_content_align
  assign media_content_align_mobile = section.settings.media_content_align_mobile

  assign media_title = section.settings.media_title
  assign media_title_custom = section.settings.media_title_custom
  assign media_title_font = section.settings.media_title_font
  assign media_title_size = section.settings.media_title_size
  assign media_title_size_mobile = section.settings.media_title_size_mobile
  assign media_title_height = section.settings.media_title_height
  assign media_title_color = section.settings.media_title_color

  assign media_text = section.settings.media_text
  assign media_text_custom = section.settings.media_text_custom
  assign media_text_font = section.settings.media_text_font
  assign media_text_size = section.settings.media_text_size
  assign media_text_size_mobile = section.settings.media_text_size_mobile
  assign media_text_height = section.settings.media_text_height
  assign media_text_color = section.settings.media_text_color
  assign media_text_mt = section.settings.media_text_mt
  assign media_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.media_text_mt_mobile

  assign product_image_ratio = section.settings.product_image_ratio
  assign product_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.product_image_ratio_mobile
  assign product_image_radius = section.settings.product_image_radius
  assign product_image_border_thickness = section.settings.product_image_border_thickness
  assign product_image_border_color = section.settings.product_image_border_color
  assign product_image_hover_type = section.settings.product_image_hover_type
  
  assign product_content_align = section.settings.product_content_align
  assign product_content_align_mobile = section.settings.product_content_align_mobile

  assign product_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if product_content_align == "center"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif product_content_align == "right"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if product_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif product_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign details_custom = section.settings.details_custom
  assign details_font = section.settings.details_font
  assign details_size = section.settings.details_size
  assign details_size_mobile = section.settings.details_size_mobile
  assign details_height = section.settings.details_height
  assign details_color = section.settings.details_color
  assign details_mt = section.settings.details_mt
  assign details_mt_mobile = section.settings.details_mt_mobile

  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color    
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare

  assign button = section.settings.button
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style

  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy 
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy' 
  endif 
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  media_badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  media_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  media_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  details_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .featured-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 40px;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }
  
  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;    
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-left: auto;
  }

  .featured-buttons-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .featured-buttons-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .featured-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
    margin-top: {{ bottom_content_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  }
  
  .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;    
    width: 100% !important;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0 !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }
  
  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
  }

  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    border: {{ media_border_thickness }}px solid {{ media_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ media_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .featured-media-{{ section.id }}::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    background-color: {{ media_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: media_overlay }};
  }

  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} video,
  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    border: 0px;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-media-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF
  }

  .featured-media-content-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    display: flex;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 20px;
    z-index: 2;
    padding: 24px 16px;
  }

  .featured-media-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: start;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 20px;
  }

  .featured-media-controls-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 8px;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: {{ media_mute_bg_color }};
    width: {{ controls_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ controls_size_mobile }}px;
    padding: {{ controls_size_mobile | times: 0.25 }}px;
    border-radius: {{ controls_radius }}px;
    border: {{ controls_border_thickness }}px solid {{ media_mute_border_color }};
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ media_mute_hover_bg_color }};
    border-color: {{ media_mute_border_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    background-color: transparent;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
  
  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ media_mute_color }};
    transition: fill 0.25s ease;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ media_mute_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }}.active svg:first-child {
    display: block;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} svg:first-child {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }}.active svg:last-child {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} svg:last-child {
    display: block;
  }

  .featured-action-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: {{ action_bg_color }};
    width: {{ controls_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ controls_size_mobile }}px;
    padding: {{ controls_size_mobile | times: 0.25 }}px;
    border-radius: {{ controls_radius }}px;
    border: {{ controls_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_color }};
    cursor: pointer;
  }  

  .featured-action-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ action_bg_hover_color }};
    border-color: {{ action_border_hover_color }};
  }
  
  .featured-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    background-color: transparent;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
  
  .featured-action-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ action_color }};
    stroke: {{ action_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-action-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ action_hover_color }};
    stroke: {{ action_hover_color }};
  }
  
  .featured-action-{{ section.id }}.active svg:first-child {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .featured-action-{{ section.id }} svg:first-child {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .featured-action-{{ section.id }}.active svg:last-child {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-action-{{ section.id }} svg:last-child {
    display: block;
  }

  .featured-media-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    padding: {{ media_badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ media_badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ media_badge_bg_color }};
    border-radius: {{ media_badge_radius }}px;
    font-size: {{ media_badge_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ media_badge_height }}%;
    color: {{ media_badge_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-media-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;  
    text-align: {{ media_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ media_title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ media_title_height }}%;
    color: {{ media_title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-media-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ media_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ media_text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-media-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;     
    font-size: {{ media_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ media_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ media_text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ product_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ product_image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ product_image_radius }}px;
    display: block;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .featured-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: 100%;
    align-items: {{ product_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }   
  
  .featured-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ details_mt_mobile }}px;    
  }

  .featured-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    font-size: {{ details_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ details_height }}%;
    color: {{ details_color }};  
    text-transform: unset;  
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;  
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
    justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;        
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }   

  .featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    text-decoration: line-through;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    border: none;
    background-color: transparent;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
    
    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: 0rem !important;
      margin-right: 0rem !important;
      padding-left: 0rem !important;
      padding-right: 0rem !important;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }    

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;       
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .featured-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row;
      margin-top: {{ bottom_content_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 30%;
    }

    .featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ controls_size }}px;
      height: {{ controls_size }}px;
      padding: {{ controls_size | times: 0.25 }}px;
    }
    
    .featured-action-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ controls_size }}px;
      width: {{ controls_size }}px;
      padding: {{ controls_size | times: 0.25 }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ media_badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ media_badge_padding_horizontal }}px;     
      font-size: {{ media_badge_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ media_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ media_title_size }}px;     
    }

    .featured-media-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ media_content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ media_text_mt }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-text-{{ section.id }} * {   
      font-size: {{ media_text_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 70% !important;
    }

    .featured-content-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ product_content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;    
    }   
    
    .featured-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ details_mt }}px;    
    }

    .featured-text-{{ section.id }} * {    
      font-size: {{ details_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {    
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;       
      justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {        
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;    
    }   

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;

  </style>
{% endif %}

  </style>
{% endif %}

{% endif %}

    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 100%;
      text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
        text-align: left;
      }

      .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: {{ heading_align }} ;
      }

      .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}
  <style>      
    .featured-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;  
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-first-image-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;  
      }

      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
        -webkit-animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.25s linear;
        animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.25s linear;   
        display: block !important;  
      } 

      @keyframes opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
        0% {
          opacity: 0;
        }
        100% {
          opacity: 1;
        }
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif product_image_hover_type == "zoom" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

      background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>

  <style>

      background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
      border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    }

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
      border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>

      padding: 0px !important;
    }

<style>
  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} featured-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="featured-top-{{ section.id }}">
        {% if heading %}
          <div class="featured-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
        {% endif %}
        <div class="featured-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
          <button class="featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="animate-icon"></span>
          </button>
          <button class="featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="animate-icon"></span>
          </button>   
        </div>
      </div>      
      <div class="featured-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="featured-media-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if media_type == 'video' %}           
            {% assign video_id = video.id | default: video_url.id %}
            {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
            {%- if video == null and video_url != null -%}
            {%- if video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
            <iframe
              src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"
              data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              data-src3="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&playsinline=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
              allowfullscreen
              class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {%- else -%}
            <iframe
              src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"    
              data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              data-src3="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
              allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
              allowfullscreen
              class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {% endif %}
            {% else %}
              {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
              <video data-src="{% if video != blank %}{{ video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" muted autoplay playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
            {% endif %}         
          {% elsif media_type == 'image' %}            
            {% if image != blank %}
              {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                {{ image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                  loading: 'lazy',
                  sizes: sizes,
                  widths: '165, 360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                }}
            {% else %}
              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
            {% endif %}        
          {% endif %}
          <div class="featured-media-content-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="featured-media-top-{{ section.id }}">
              {% if media_type == 'video' %}
                <div class="featured-media-controls-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }} active">

                    </svg>
                  </div>
                  {% if use_action %}
                    <div class="featured-action-{{ section.id }} active">
                      <svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="16" width="16">
                        <path d="M4 12.266666666666666V3.733333333333333c0 -0.22091333333333332 0.17908666666666664 -0.39999999999999997 0.39999999999999997 -0.39999999999999997h1.8666666666666665c0.22091333333333332 0 0.39999999999999997 0.17908666666666664 0.39999999999999997 0.39999999999999997v8.533333333333333c0 0.22093333333333331 -0.17908666666666664 0.39999999999999997 -0.39999999999999997 0.39999999999999997H4.3999999999999995c-0.22091333333333332 0 -0.39999999999999997 -0.17906666666666665 -0.39999999999999997 -0.39999999999999997Z" fill="#121212" stroke="#121212" stroke-width="1"></path>

                      </svg>

                        <path d="M4.60392 3.0245466666666663C4.33728 2.8665333333333334 4 3.0587199999999997 4 3.36866V12.631333333333332c0 0.3099333333333333 0.33728 0.5021333333333333 0.60392 0.3441333333333333l7.815413333333333 -4.631333333333333c0.26139999999999997 -0.1549333333333333 0.26139999999999997 -0.5333333333333333 0 -0.6882666666666666L4.60392 3.0245466666666663Z" fill="#121212" stroke="#121212" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>

                </div>
              {% endif %}
              {% if media_badge != blank %}
                <p class="featured-media-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ media_badge }}</p>
              {% endif %}              
            </div>
            <div class="featured-media-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
              {% if media_title != blank %}
                <p class="featured-media-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ media_title }}</p>
              {% endif %}
              {% if media_text != blank %}
                <div class="featured-media-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ media_text }}</div>
              {% endif %}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="featured-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper preview"
          data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
          data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}"
          data-view="{{ slider_view }}"
          data-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">                          
              {% if collection == blank %}
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  <div class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                    <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% elsif block.settings.product.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-product-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.custom_image != blank %}
                        <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.custom_second_image != blank and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}featured-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                          {{ block.settings.custom_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                            loading: loading_attribute,
                            sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                            widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                            alt: block.settings.custom_image.alt | escape
                          }}
                        </div>
                        {% if block.settings.custom_second_image != blank and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}
                          <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} featured-second-image-{{ section.id }}">                                       
                              {{ block.settings.custom_second_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                alt: block.settings.custom_second_image.alt | escape
                              }}                      
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}
                      {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}  
                        <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.product.media.size > 1 and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}featured-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                          {% if block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                             {{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                alt: block.settings.product.featured_image.alt | escape
                              }}             
                          {% else %}
                            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                          {% endif %}  
                        </div>  
                        {% if block.settings.product.media.size > 1 and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}
                          <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} featured-second-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.product.media.size > 1 %}
                              {% for media in block.settings.product.media %}
                                {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                                    {{ media | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                      loading: loading_attribute,
                                      sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                      widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                      alt: media.alt | escape
                                    }} 
                                {% endif %}
                              {% endfor %}
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>
                        {% endif %} 
                      {% else %}
                        <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">
                          {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% elsif block.settings.product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>

                    <div class="featured-content-{{ section.id }}">
                      <div class="featured-content-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank %}
                          <h3 class="featured-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.custom_title }}</h3>
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.title != blank %}
                          <h3 class="featured-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</h3>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if block.settings.details != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-text-{{ section.id }}"><p>{{ block.settings.details }}</p></div>
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.metafields.custom.specs.value != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-text-{{ section.id }}"><p>{{ block.settings.product.metafields.custom.specs.value }}</p></div>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if block.settings.product != blank %}  
                          <div class="featured-price-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if price_compare and block.settings.product.compare_at_price != blank %}
                              <p class="featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                            <p class="featured-regular-price-{{ section.id }}">
                              {{ block.settings.product.price | money }}                        
                            </p>                     
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>                     
                      {% if button != blank %}
                        <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href={{ block.settings.url }}{% elsif block.settings.product.url != blank %}a href={{ block.settings.product.url }}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-button-{{ section.id }}">
                          <p class="featured-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                          {{ button }}
                          {% if button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}

                                <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                              </svg>
                            {% endif %}
                          </p>
                        </{% if block.settings.url != blank or block.settings.product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% else %}  
                {% for product in collections[collection].products limit: collection_show %}
                  <div class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                    <a href="{{ product.url }}" class="featured-product-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} {% if product.media.size > 1 and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}featured-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                          {% if product.featured_image != blank %}                     
                            {{ product.featured_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                              loading: loading_attribute,
                              sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                              widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                              alt: product.featured_image.alt | escape
                            }}                                   
                          {% else %}
                            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                          {% endif %}                            
                        </div>  
                        {% if product.media.size > 1 and product_image_hover_type == "second_image" %}
                          <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} featured-second-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if product.media.size > 1 %}
                              {% for media in product.media %}
                                {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                                  {{ media | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                    loading: loading_attribute,
                                    sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                    widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                    alt: media.alt | escape
                                  }}  
                                {% endif %}
                              {% endfor %}
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}      
                    </a>
                    <div class="featured-content-{{ section.id }}">
                      <div class="featured-content-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if product.title != blank %}
                          <h3 class="featured-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.title }}</h3>
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if product.metafields.custom.specs.value != blank %}
                          <div class="featured-text-{{ section.id }}"><p>{{ product.metafields.custom.specs.value }}</p></div>
                        {% endif %}
                        <div class="featured-price-{{ section.id }}">
                          {% if price_compare and product.compare_at_price != blank %}
                            <p class="featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                          {% endif %}
                          <p class="featured-regular-price-{{ section.id }}">
                            {{ product.price | money }}
                          </p>                     
                        </div>         
                      </div>                             
                      {% if button != blank %}
                        <{% if product.url != blank %}a href={{ product.url }}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-button-{{ section.id }}">
                          <p class="featured-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                          {{ button }}
                          {% if button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                              <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>

                                <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                              </svg>
                            {% endif %}
                          </p>
                        </{% if product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              {% endif %}            
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>


<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection18() {
    document.querySelector('.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');

    let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

    window.addEventListener(
      "LazyLoad::Initialized",
      function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },
      false
    );

    document.querySelector('.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');

    const slider = new Swiper(".featured-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,    
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 1),
        }
      },
    }); 

const medias = document.querySelector('.featured-media-{{ section.id }}');
const isSafari = /^((?!chrome|android).)*safari/i.test(navigator.userAgent);

function setupVimeoAPI(iframe) {
  if (!window.Vimeo) {
    const tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = "https://player.vimeo.com/api/player.js";
    document.head.appendChild(tag);
    tag.onload = () => setupVimeoAPI(iframe);
    return null;
  }

  if (!iframe.vimeoPlayer && window.Vimeo && window.Vimeo.Player) {
    iframe.vimeoPlayer = new Vimeo.Player(iframe);
    iframe.vimeoPlayer.ready().then(() => {
      iframe.vimeoPlayerReady = true;
    });
  }

  return iframe.vimeoPlayer;
}

function setupYouTubeAPI(iframe) {
  if (!window.YT) {
    const tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
    document.head.appendChild(tag);
    return;
  }

  const srcUrl = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1') || iframe.src;
  const match = srcUrl.match(/embed\/([^?]*)/);
  if (!match || !match[1]) return;

  const videoId = match[1];

  if (!iframe.youtubePlayer && window.YT && window.YT.Player) {
    iframe.youtubePlayer = new YT.Player(iframe, {
      videoId: videoId,
      events: {
        'onReady': () => {
          iframe.youtubePlayerReady = true;
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

  if (medias) {
    const video = medias.querySelector('video');
    const iframe = medias.querySelector('iframe');
    const videoButton = medias.querySelector('.featured-action-{{ section.id }}');
    const muteButton = medias.querySelector('.featured-media-mute-{{ section.id }}');

    if (iframe) {
      if (iframe.src.includes('youtube') || iframe.getAttribute('data-src1')?.includes('youtube')) {
        setupYouTubeAPI(iframe);
      } else if (iframe.src.includes('vimeo') || iframe.getAttribute('data-src1')?.includes('vimeo')) {
        setupVimeoAPI(iframe);
      }
    }

    if (videoButton) {
      videoButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        setTimeout(() => {
          const isActive = videoButton.classList.contains('active');

          if (isActive) {
            if (video) video.pause();

            if (iframe) {
              if (iframe.src.includes('youtube') && iframe.youtubePlayerReady) {
                iframe.youtubePlayer.pauseVideo();
              } else if (iframe.src.includes('vimeo') && iframe.vimeoPlayerReady) {
                iframe.vimeoPlayer.pause();
              } else {
                iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src3');
              }
            }
          } else {
            if (video) {
              video.play().catch(() => {
                video.muted = true;
                video.play();
              });
            }

            if (iframe) {
              if (iframe.src.includes('youtube')) {
                const player = setupYouTubeAPI(iframe);
                if (player && iframe.youtubePlayerReady) {
                  player.playVideo();
                } else {
                  iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
                }
              } else if (iframe.src.includes('vimeo')) {
                const player = setupVimeoAPI(iframe);
                if (player && iframe.vimeoPlayerReady) {
                  player.play();
                } else {
                  iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
                }
              } else {
                iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
              }
            }
          }

          videoButton.classList.toggle('active');
        }, 400);
      });
    }

    if (muteButton) {
      muteButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const isMuted = muteButton.classList.contains('active');

        if (!isMuted) {
          if (video) video.muted = true;

          if (iframe) {
            if (iframe.src.includes('youtube') && iframe.youtubePlayerReady) {
              iframe.youtubePlayer.mute();
            } else if (iframe.src.includes('vimeo') && iframe.vimeoPlayerReady) {
              iframe.vimeoPlayer.setVolume(0);
            }
          }
        } else {
          if (video) {
            try {
              video.muted = false;
              if (isSafari) video.volume = 1.0;
            } catch (e) {
              console.error("Safari mute error", e);
            }
          }

          if (iframe && iframe.src.includes('youtube')) {
            console.log(iframe)
            setupYouTubeAPI(iframe);          
            const tryUnmute = () => {
              if (iframe.youtubePlayerReady && iframe.youtubePlayer) {
                iframe.youtubePlayer.unMute();
                iframe.youtubePlayer.playVideo();
              } else {
                setTimeout(tryUnmute, 100);
              }
            };
            tryUnmute();
          } else if (iframe && iframe.src.includes('vimeo') && iframe.vimeoPlayerReady) {
            iframe.vimeoPlayer.setVolume(1);
          }
        }

        muteButton.classList.toggle('active');
      });
    }
  }

  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection18);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection18);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection18);
  }
</script>

video_url.label: Video embed from URL
video_url.description: Youtube, Vimeo. Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

media_ratio.label: Aspect ratio
media_ratio.description: Shorter media will auto-resize to match content height.

collection.label: Collection
collection.description: Leave this blank to display products from the blocks.

button.label: Button label
button.description: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
